comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons] There is a pale-coloured block with a tower on Cremorne Point (still there).  Maybe Mr Hood was up there for these pics?

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons/8545852953/]

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons] ps I have been been meaning to ask how do you get Flickr to do thumbnail-sized link thingys?

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Ah I see!
With the thumbnail size, click to share the photograph, then click "Grab the HTML/BBCode" and then change the sizing just below the html code. :)
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons] Thanks - that seems way too complicated for lil' ol' me.  Specially with the new un-improved Flickr!  I'll stick to my normal large "toenails" - I just grab the URL address and whack it in square brackets.

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Hehe toenails, there's not much difference between the size anyway :P
